title: Cheesy Ground Beef Casserole
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (205°C). Lightly spray a 2-quart casserole dish with olive oil.
Heat a large 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Lightly spray with olive oil.
Add ground beef and cook, breaking into small pieces, until no longer raw (about 5 minutes). Drain and return to skillet.
Reduce heat to medium. Mix in salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, and cayenne pepper.
Slowly mix in cream cheese until fully melted and incorporated.
Turn off heat and stir in half of the shredded cheddar (57g).
Transfer mixture to prepared casserole dish. Sprinkle remaining cheddar on top.
notes: Volume conversions: 2 lbs = 907g, 4 oz cream cheese = 113g, 1 cup shredded cheese = 113g, 2 tbsp parsley ≈ 8g
Recipe is keto-friendly and low-carb at 2g carbs per serving
